mission.posting: You already know, lets get that damn game!

email.subject: Los Pollos Hermanos
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#! There is a leak of beta realease half life 3. The objective is to get that, start scanning the website valve corporation using host command in your actual terminal. Connect that ip, do not forget to use arp tool.
Best regards, Codex Connect Hub Services
